prompt: Create an isolated, print-ready illustration on a transparent background, centered composition, focusing only on the print artwork. TEXT: "STAY\nURBANIC". Design a bold, urban graffiti composition: top line in large, white, rough-edged brush-style uppercase letters with heavy paint splatters and smeared strokes; bottom line in vivid yellow, chunky hand-painted graffiti script with pronounced vertical paint drips and a distressed texture suitable for screen printing. Include a detailed cartoon streetwise chimp character as the central mascot: three-quarter back view with a small yellow crown perched above its head, confident pose, strong black line art, denim-blue jacket accents and red sneaker highlights â€” integrate the character so the yellow word overlays slightly across the character's upper back for layered depth. Add spray-paint splatters, subtle halftone shading and ink splatter drips that connect typography and illustration for cohesive street-art energy. Maintain vector-clean outlines, high-contrast values, simplified shading for printing, and balanced negative space around the centered stack. Transparent background, print-ready clean design, isolated artwork only; no garment, no mockup, no fabric, no shadows.
negative_prompt: mockup, garment, clothing, model, photo, fabric, shadows, background, watermark, low-resolution, photorealistic, t-shirt mockup, hoodie mockup, garment, fabric texture, wrinkles, folds, shadows, photo, model, background scene, studio lighting

debug.notes: Top line clearly reads like a four-letter graffiti word resembling 'STAY' (S is distinct; middle letters T/A are stylized but plausible). Bottom yellow word reads as seven letters resembling 'URBANIC' but could also be 'URANIC' or another similar graffiti spelling; the brushy, overlapping drips and stylization make the B ambiguous. Chosen best-guess 'URBANIC' to fit urban/streetwear theme.
